nodes.text: Onto was a male Zabrak who served as a sergeant in the army of the Galactic Republic during the Galactic War against the reconstituted Sith Empire. In 3640 BBY, he was stationed on the planet Ilum while a battle took place there. During the battle, Shrokti sold stimulants from a stall in the Republic base camp. While at the stall, he wore a white and purple armor and carried a blaster pistol. Onto had green eyes, no hair and tanned skin.

Onto first appeared in Star Wars: The Old Republic, a 2011 MMORPG produced by BioWare. In the game he served as a Republic stimulants vendor on Ilum. His location was marked on a map in the Prima Games guide for the game.
